page.title: 17MOBILE SERVICES.S.SHROPSHIRE
page.content: The{mobile library}comes round fortnightly to the village and once a term to school. The van is yellow with blue lettering and comes from Ludlow about 15 km away. Brown's{bakery}have a Transit van which comes on Monday and Thursday. He mostly sells bread, fizzy pop and sweets from a tray. He usually has a few cakes, mostly cream cakes, with him. He has 30 to 40 customers in this area. The bakery is in Cleobury Mortimer, about 8km away. Two{mobile stores}vans deliver groceries, sweets, pop, bread, green groceries etc. twice a week each . A{Doctor}holds a weekly surgery at the post office. The{gas bottle supply store}will deliver propane or butane bottles. There is an{emergency call service. {}
